title: Textile, late 19th century
medium:
Medium: wool
Technique: warp-faced plain weave and complementary warps
description: Two panels stitched together; both have a dark brown ground with vertical stripes of maroon, white, blue and white; and red, yellow and white. Geometric patterning in the colored stripes. Selvages turned back and hemmed.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, late 19th century.Medium: wool
Technique: warp-faced plain weave and complementary warps. 1933-4-1.
